author.persName: Mirzā Muḥammad Ḥasan ibn Muḥammad ʻAlī
مرزا محمد حسن بن محمد علي

msItem.title: Mirʼāt-i Aḥmadī
مرآت احمدي
msItem.note: Folio one, recto: title in read, probably by original rubricator, and presentation stamp, as on Nos 82 and 83. The Khatimah or conclusion, giving an extensive account of the City and Subah of Ahmadabad. Uniform with Nos. 82 and 83, containing the earlier portions of the work. Scribe: Shiv La'l son of Sundar La'l Nakir Ahmadabadi. Written for John Romer. Rubrication as on No 82.
msItem.incipit: Khatimah dar bayan-i bana wa 'ard wa tul wa daur-i hisar-i shahr-panah

listBibl.bibl: As for RAS Persian MSS Nos 82 and 83.

handNote.persName: Shiv La'l son of Sundar La'l Nakir Ahmadabadi

bindingDesc.p: Binding uniform with Nos 82 and 83, but with spine replaced in England.

origin.p: Surat. See No 84. Sunday 29 Dhu Qa'da A.H. 1237, 18 August A.D. 1822, Bahadurwashadbij 1878 Vikram Samvat.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
